divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the back yard cooking, and looking at the stars. Facing south, one formation of stars caught my eye for about a hour. After I ate I was watching the same formation. When the first star that started formation, just started floating north. It looked just like all the other stars, like a white diamond in the sky. I didn't give chase, I see them all the time.
Summary: It was with a star formation for a long time, then just started floating north. I was looking south.
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around August 5th 2012
